name: Vegan Corn Bread
description: You will love this vegan cornbread! It's super easy to make, soft, moist, and buttery completely without dairy products or eggs! It's great with chili or just on its own with vegan butter or maple syrup.
recipeIngredient: 1 cup unsweetened soy or almond milk

recipeInstructions.text: Combine the dry ingredients (cornmeal, flour, baking powder, baking soda, salt, and brown sugar) in a large bowl and stir well.
recipeInstructions.name: Combine the dry ingredients (cornmeal, flour, baking powder, baking soda, salt, and brown sugar) in a large bowl and stir well.

recipeInstructions.text: Melt the vegan butter in a small pot on the stovetop or in the microwave. Then add it to the cornmeal flour mixture together with the unsweetened plant-based milk and the apple cider vinegar. Stir with a wooden spoon until well combined, but don't overmix.
recipeInstructions.name: Melt the vegan butter in a small pot on the stovetop or in the microwave. Then add it to the cornmeal flour mixture together with the unsweetened plant-based milk and the apple cider vinegar. Stir with a wooden spoon until well combined, but don't overmix.

recipeInstructions.text: Add the corn kernels. Stir well.
recipeInstructions.name: Add the corn kernels. Stir well.

recipeInstructions.text: Generously grease an  8 or 9-inch square baking dish with vegan butter. Pour the prepared batter into the dish and evenly divide it with a spatula.
recipeInstructions.name: Generously grease an  8 or 9-inch square baking dish with vegan butter. Pour the prepared batter into the dish and evenly divide it with a spatula.

recipeInstructions.text: Preheat the oven to 400 °F. Bake the cornbread for 20-25 minutes.
recipeInstructions.name: Preheat the oven to 400 °F. Bake the cornbread for 20-25 minutes.

recipeInstructions.text: Allow the cornbread to slightly cool before slicing and serving. Serve with butter or maple syrup. Enjoy!
recipeInstructions.name: Allow the cornbread to slightly cool before slicing and serving. Serve with butter or maple syrup. Enjoy!
